PublicRemarks: Fresh updates, stylish finishes, and plenty of space come together in this 4-bedroom, 3.5-bath townhome in Woodgate Manor. With two assigned parking spaces and a clean, modern look throughout, this home is truly move-in ready. The main level has been fully reimagined with white shaker cabinets, stainless steel appliances, sleek LVP flooring, a statement marble backsplash, and black hardware that tie the whole space together. It flows easily into the dining and living areas, giving you a bright, open setup that’s great for daily life and hosting. Upstairs, the primary suite feels like its own retreat thanks to a spa-style bathroom with a deep soaking tub, a large frameless glass shower, and a custom double vanity. The additional two upstairs bedrooms are spacious and full of natural light, sharing a full bathroom.  The finished basement offers even more room to spread out, complete with a full bedroom and full bathroom for guests and a rec room that you could use as an office, living area, or work out room. The location puts you close to Virginia Chase County Park, commuter routes, shopping, dining, and everything Centreville has to offer. Also, you get to enjoy exclusive community amenities such as a playground, tennis courts, a community pool, and pickleball courts. Homes with upgrades like these don’t stay available long. Come see it for yourself and imagine how you’d make it your own.

PublicRemarks: Back on the market because Buyer's financing fell through.  Welcome to this beautifully updated home, where modern comfort seamlessly blends with timeless charm,  offering a truly turnkey lifestyle. Pride of ownership radiates throughout, with major systems refreshed recently  to deliver unparalleled peace of mind: a brand-new roof ensures lasting protection and efficiency, the main water line has been fully replaced to the street for reliable plumbing, a sleek new garage door and opener provide effortless access, and new HVAC system maintains comfort year-round. Step inside to discover an interior elevated by thoughtful enhancements, starting with custom built-ins in the basement, dining room, and primary bedroom that offer stylish storage and display solutions tailored to everyday elegance. Gather by the cozy fireplace, beautifully accented by elegant built-ins that invite warmth and conversation, while the luxuriously remodeled bathrooms from 2021 bring spa-like serenity with contemporary finishes. The chef's dream kitchen, fully revamped in 2018, shines with all-new appliances, including a washer and dryer, for effortless entertaining and efficiency, all set against gleaming hardwood floors on the main level and refined crown molding that lends an upscale polish. Outside, curb appeal soars with durable Thomas Creek exterior doors and shutters, a freshly painted deck ready for morning coffee, and a new patio installed in 2024, perfect for al fresco dining or lazy summer afternoons under the stars. This home isn't just updated—it's a canvas ready for your story, so schedule a showing today and experience why it's the one you've been waiting for.

Enjoy the outdoors on your large private deck, and take advantage of the community amenities: pool, tennis and pickleball courts, walking trails, and a playground. PublicRemarks: Oh go ahead! You know you’d love more privacy. Tucked at the quiet end of Gunther Court in sought-after Woodgate Manor, this refreshed end-unit townhome is where privacy meets possibility. Surrounded by tall trees and buffered by open green space and a small creek, the home feels wrapped in its own little nature preserve, without sacrificing convenience. From the moment you step into the foyer, the updates begin to shine. The main level features fresh 2024-matching laminate flooring throughout the open living and dining areas, tying the space together with warmth and continuity. The kitchen renovation (2018) brings modern flair with sleek tile underfoot, stainless steel appliances including a 2018 dishwasher and gas stove, and smart storage that makes the most of the layout. Upstairs, three spacious bedrooms include two with laminate flooring and one with soft carpet underfoot. The two secondary bedrooms offer peaceful wooded views out back. The full bath has been upgraded with a recent new vanity top, toilet, and hardware, clean, fresh, ready to go. On the lower level, you’ll find a fully finished walk-out basement (complete with its own full bath) that opens to a private patio nestled into the treeline. Whether it’s a movie room, workout zone, or overflow space for guests, this flexible level adapts easily.  The 2021 water heater is still young, and recent upgrades include all new toilets and supply lines, energy-efficient LED flush-mount lighting, and anti-tamper outlets throughout. It’s the kind of care that rarely makes a listing sheet but means everything to a new homeowner. You get two reserved parking spaces right outside, ample guest parking, and access to a neighborhood with tennis courts, a pool, and snow/trash service included in the low-cost monthly HOA. But it’s really the sense of seclusion, a rare find in this part of Centreville, that makes this one stand out. And when you're ready to venture out, you're just minutes from the I-66/29 junction, a commuter lot, and The Field at Commonwealth—a local favorite with Wegmans, Crumbl Cookies, Lazy Dog, CAVA, and Peet’s Coffee all in one spot. Ready for your quiet corner of Centreville? This one’s calling your name.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 5990 Manorwood Drive, a stunning end-unit townhome nestled in the sought-after Woodgate Manor Community of Centreville, VA. This elegant residence boasts three spacious bedrooms and three beautifully updated bathrooms, all adorned with custom designer details and exquisite tile work completed in 2020. The bright and airy interior is enhanced by recessed LED lighting throughout, creating a warm and modern ambiance. The gourmet kitchen is a chef’s delight, offering ample storage and contemporary finishes, including a coffee counter and new cabinets with quartz countertops. Step outside to a generously sized, freshly painted wrap-around deck and fenced-in backyard, perfect for outdoor relaxation and entertainment. The property features a one-car garage and an extended driveway accommodating up to two additional vehicles. Recent improvements includes a 2 year old hot water heater, newer roof and gutters, updated flooring on 2 levels including the staircases/new tiling in on the main level, and newer windows, ensuring a turnkey experience. The HVAC system's controller unit was replaced just two years ago, providing peace of mind for climate control. Over $65K in upgrades! Residents will enjoy the community's amenities, including a pool, tennis court, and basketball court, with plenty of guest parking available. This pet-friendly neighborhood is conveniently located near a variety of shopping, dining, and grocery options. Don't miss the opportunity to own this meticulously maintained home that combines elegance and modern living in a vibrant community. Act quickly—this gem won't last long!

PublicRemarks: Offer deadline: Aug 19, 6pm.  Welcome to this beautiful 3-level townhouse in the heart of Centreville, featuring 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. With 3 private parking spaces (including 1 garage and 2 driveway spots), along with visitor and street parking right in front, parking is never a problem. This home has everything you’re looking for, including a newly renovated kitchen with granite countertops. The open floor plan with hardwood floors and a charming front garden make a great first impression. The fully finished walkout basement, accessible from both the garage and living room, offers spacious recreation areas and a cozy fireplace, leading to a private, fenced backyard oasis. The main level includes a half bathroom, dining area, and access to a lovely deck perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, you’ll find 3 well-sized bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, with the master bedroom featuring vaulted ceilings and a walk-in closet. The home has been well-maintained by the sellers and is in excellent condition. Enjoy the community amenities like a pool, tennis courts, and trails, with easy access to the Vienna Metro bus/lot. Ideally located near I-66, Wegmans, and Dulles Airport (IAD) within 20 minutes, this property is a must see.

This townhome has it all! This great 3-bedroom, 3-bath gem offers the perfect blend of comfort and ultimate convenience. Step inside to discover a versatile entertainment room on the first floor with a bathroom; ideal for movie nights, game days or a bonus bedroom. The walkout basement seamlessly extends to an expansive grassy yard, creating a wonderful space for outdoor gatherings and relaxation. The main level boasts a spacious kitchen with granite counters, and a charming breakfast nook that looks out onto the deck, perfect for casual meals and morning coffee. Adjacent, the oversized living and dining area provide ample room for both everyday living and entertaining guests. Upstairs, the top-floor primary bedroom is a true retreat with vaulted ceilings and a generous walk-in closet.  You will enjoy the indoor space, multiple outdoor areas to relax plus a convenient one-car attached garage which offers easy access and extra storage. With a newer HVAC system (2022) , this low maintenance unit is perfect. All this situated close to Fair Oaks Mall, major highways and shopping centers. Some rooms have been virtually staged with accessories. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this great townhome your own! *OFFER DEADLINE MONDAY 8/5 at  2PM, SELLER RESERVES THE RIGHT TO  ACCEPT AN OFFER BEFORE THE DEADLINE*

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 5907 Baron Kent Lane in Centreville. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhome is just mere seconds off Rt. 66 and 29 and minutes from Rt. 28. The main level has floor to ceiling windows which bring in a ton of natural light during the day. The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops with an eat-in area and an island in the center. The oversized deck is right off the back of the house, which backs to trees and woods, where you will find the Rocky Run creek. The upper level is where you will find the 3 bedrooms. The primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom. There are two additional bedrooms, equally sized with each other, that share the other full bathroom. The entire upper level has vaulted ceilings. The lower level includes a versatile space that can be used for whatever you desire. The washer/dryer is located on this level, as well as an additional storage room, the garage, and a walk-out patio. Recent upgrades include: Roof replaced in September 2022 All new windows installed in 2022 Garage door replaced Aluminum trim replaced Fresh paint throughout the house HOA fee includes: Community pool membership Access to tennis courts in neighborhood, as well as new pickle ball court Trash & recycle pick up Neighborhood is zoned for Deer Park Elementary School The neighborhood has scenic walking paths, and is also walkable (less than a mile each way) to the closest shopping center, which has a Giant grocery store, local restaurants, Starbucks, a yoga studio, etc. Listing agent is also owner of the property

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your dream home! This meticulously maintained three-bedroom, four-bathroom townhouse offers an exceptional blend of modern updates and classic charm. Spread across three levels, beautiful hardwood and tile flooring flows seamlessly throughout, this home is perfectly designed for comfortable living and entertaining. At the main level features a handy half bath, The sun-drenched kitchen enjoys morning sunlight, creating the perfect spot for your morning coffee. Step outside to enjoy a generous, private deck—perfect for entertaining or relaxing with family and friends, while the basement includes an additional full bath, ensuring convenience for guests and everyday needs. The bright and airy living spaces are complemented by a well-laid-out floor plan, ensuring each room flows seamlessly into the next.  Upstairs, you'll find spacious 3 bedrooms with ample closet space and a primary suite with its own private bathroom. Modern, energy-efficient appliances were added in 2022, making the kitchen both stylish and functional. In 2021, the patio was done, creating an ideal space for outdoor gatherings and relaxation. The hot water heater was replaced on 2023, the HVAC system a reliable unit well maintained continues to perform excellently ensures efficient heating and cooling.  The location of the townhouse offers the best of both worlds: convenience and tranquility. Imagine easy commutes thanks to its proximity to the rt66, rt29, rt28 and walking distance to Centreville Park & Ride, Coffee shops, Restaurants, Grocery stores and more. The neighborhood boasts lush green spaces, perfect for leisurely strolls. Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity to own a home that combines convenience, modern updates, and a serene environment.

AgentRemarks: Seller is flexible with moving date and welcomes all offers.
PublicRemarks: What makes this property special?  • Assumable VA Loan: The property comes with an assumable VA loan with a 4.25% interest rate. The seller is willing to pass their eligibility to another qualified VA buyer (Seller will not pass benefit to civilian). Seller is open to other traditional financing such as conventional or FHA as well as VA. Current Monthly payments: $3346.93 (not including HOA) Approximate loan balance: $533,638.98 • Monthly Savings: VA Buyers could save more than $800 per month compared to current market rates by assuming this VA loan. The savings make the property more affordable and financially attractive. • Upgrades: The property has undergone extensive upgrades, including all carpets removed and replaced with vinyl flooring, fresh paint, entire basement has been finished, gutters have been cleaned out and gutter covers added for fall, deck and fence has been stained and all broken/chipped wood replaced, recessed lights have been added to the main level and in lower level, entire basement has been finished, new kitchennette counters and hot top have been added to basement, basement is configured to rent out to a separate tenant if owner choses to do so, it even has a separate entrance.   • Convenient Location: The property's location is highly convenient. It is close to Dulles Airport, grocery stores (Trader Joe’s, multiple Giants, Wegmans), and Highway 66, providing easy access to Tysons and Washington, DC. Proximity to major transportation hubs and amenities can enhance the property's appeal and convenience for residents.  Overall, this listing offers a combination of financial benefits through the assumable VA loan, along with attractive upgrades and a convenient location in a market in which inventory is low.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this spectacular 3 finished level with 3 bedrooms and 3.5 Bathrooms townhouse in the prime location of Centreville. With 3 private parking (1 Garage and 2 Drive way parking) , plus visitors parking and street parking spots right in front of the house, it makes much easier for the multiple car parking. This home has everything on your wish list. Flowing floor plan with the hardwood floors and lovely front garden makes a great impression to the house.  You can access the basement from the garage or from the living room upstairs. The walkout basement is fully finished with ample spaced recreation areas and beautiful fireplace. Walk out to your private oasis with fenced backyard.  The spacious main level has a half bathroom, kitchen and a dining space. The kitchen has granite countertops. Oak stairs, chair rails, winder stairs, recessed light , and crown moldings in the ceilings makes it even more attractive. Access the beautiful deck from the kitchen where you can spend your quality time with family and friends.  The upper level has 3 decent sized bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. Master bedroom has a vaulted ceilings and a walk in closet. Sellers have meticulously maintained the house and it is in good condition.  You can enjoy pool, Tennis, Trails, and much more. Vienna Metro bus/lot is very close to the property. This property is close to I-66, Wegmans, IAD within 20 minutes and many more. A must see property. Photos will be uploaded on or before June 19.
